channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump erupts about Trevor Noah joke linking him to Bill Clinton and Jeffrey Epstein: ‘I can’t speak for Bill, but I have never been to Epstein Island’
item.description: Trevor Noah's savage joke said Trump wants Greenland because "Epstein’s island is gone, he needs a new island to hang out with Bill Clinton."

item.title: ‘No one is illegal on stolen land’: how the Grammys turned into a giant Trump roast and ICE protest
item.description: Even Justin and Hailey Bieber, who don’t normally address American politics, wore protest pins about ICE.

item.title: How The Camera Phone Gave Birth To Citizen Journalism
item.description: The camera phone, born from Philippe Kahn’s 1997 innovation, transformed everyday people into citizen journalists, democratizing truth, storytelling, ...

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Tuesday, February 3 Clues And Answers (#968)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: ‘Dragon Quest VII Reimagined’ Review: Technically Brilliant, But A Bit Clinical
item.description: The latest of the 'Dragon Quest' remakes tackles its seventh instalment, and it’s a remarkable piece of work, if a little clinical.

item.title: Ian McKellen Leaks Magneto Will Destroy This State In ‘Avengers Doomsday’
item.description: Avengers: Doomsday has given us so little information that its major cast members are starting to give us substantive leaks.

item.title: It’s so cold in Florida that iguanas are falling out of trees
item.description: “I think in South Florida you're going to see iguanas falling from trees, I mean a lot, once it gets under 40 degrees,” Gov. Ron DeSantis said.

item.title: Europe-wide army is a dumb idea, EU foreign policy chief says: ‘maybe those people haven’t really thought this through practically’
item.description: “If you are already part of NATO then you can’t create a separate army," Kaja Kallas said at a security conference in Norway.

Costco issues recall notice for bakery item due to undeclared allergen
item.description: Costco has recalled mislabeled "Mini Beignets filled with Caramel" that could cause allergic reactions due to undeclared tree nuts in 22 states.

item.title: New SNAP work requirements take effect in more states under Trump-backed law
item.description: New SNAP work requirements are taking effect in additional states, expanding eligibility rules and reshaping benefits under a Trump-backed law.

item.title: Who is Kevin Warsh, Trump's pick to succeed Jerome Powell as Fed chair?
item.description: President Donald Trump announced on Friday that he is nominating former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh to become chairman of the central bank.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
